description: The Open Screen Protocol is a suite of network protocols that allow user agents to implement the Presentation API and the Remote Playback API in an interoperable fashion.
title: Open Screen Protocol

description: An API to enable web content to access external presentation-type displays and use them for presenting web content.
title: Presentation API

description: This specification defines an API extending the HTMLMediaElement that enables controlling remote playback of media from a web page onto remote playback devices such as connected TVs, projectors or audio-only speakers, attached using wired (HDMI, DVI, or similar) and wireless technologies (Miracast, Chromecast, DLNA, AirPlay, or similar).
title: Remote Playback API

description: This document defines a web platform API that allows script to query the device for information about its screens, and place content on specific screens.
title: Window Management
